outcome.title: Hearing Outcome
outcome.content: Select the outcome of the hearing. Choose 'Adjournment' if the hearing was postponed to a future date.

outcomeText.title: Outcome Notes
outcomeText.content: Provide a detailed summary of what transpired during the hearing, including key discussions, decisions made, and any instructions from the authority.

nextHearingDate.title: Next Hearing Date
nextHearingDate.content: If the hearing was adjourned, specify the date for the next hearing. This date will be used to automatically create a follow-up hearing.
